languages.translation_comment: После куя делаем как в администратуме — "прошел 1 час".
После куя делаем как в администратуме — "прошел 1 час".

languages.text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard harrumphs triumphantly.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the roots of your noble lineage..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

languages.text: {n}Sans cacher sa satisfaction, Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Comme je vous le disais, nous allons commencer par les origines de votre noble lignée... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans cacher sa satisfaction, Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Comme je vous le disais, nous allons commencer par les origines de votre noble lignée... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard carraspea con expresión satisfecha.{/n} «Como iba diciendo, comenzaremos por los orígenes de su noble linaje...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard carraspea con expresión satisfecha.{/n} «Como iba diciendo, comenzaremos por los orígenes de su noble linaje...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子，看起来很得意。{/n}“正如我之前所言，我们要从您高贵血统的起源讲起……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子，看起来很得意。{/n}“正如我之前所言，我们要从您高贵血统的起源讲起……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いをしてドヤ顔をした。{/n}「申し上げたように、まずはあなたの高貴な血統の起源から始めましょう…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いをしてドヤ顔をした。{/n}「申し上げたように、まずはあなたの高貴な血統の起源から始めましょう…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich mit selbstzufriedener Miene.{/n} "Wie gesagt, wir beginnen mit den Ursprüngen Eurer adligen Herkunft ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich mit selbstzufriedener Miene.{/n} "Wie gesagt, wir beginnen mit den Ursprüngen Eurer adligen Herkunft ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, boğazını temizleyip ukala bir görünüş sergiliyor.{/n} "Dediğim gibi asil soyunuzun kökenlerinden başlamalıyız."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat and looks smug.{/n} "As I was saying, we shall begin with the origins of your noble lineage..."
